Author: nonotseventeen
Text: my dad suffers from an ED, but i don’t think my parents thought it was a serious one (binge eating, typical mindset of “well you’re not skinny so you don’t have an ED”). i recently started seeing a psychiatrist and when i was telling my mom about my appointments and diagnoses, i said “... and food issues, but i want to handle that on my own...” and she got upset and kind of forced it out of me.  to be honest, i don’t think it affects them. i told my mom i don’t purge anymore, even though i do, just to get her off my back. my rules don’t send them red flags, so basically i’m safe from their discrimination.

Author: a-lost-dustcell
Text: Mine, my mom looked through my phone while  I was getting in trouble for something else. My sister told her after she kinda forced it out of me. My mom thought I was attention seeking, but I really wasn’t. Months later, she found all of the food that she thought I was eating, but kinda hidden in various places in my room while she was cleaning it. I had been at this for almost an entire year. She never knew the extent of it until she cleaned my room.    My advice- Don’t let your parents discover it by accident. I don’t know how strict your parents are.. but just sit them down one day and be like “hey.. we need to talk about something”. It’s basically like a “coming out” kinda thing. Lol
